data.title: Ependes climate: Weather Ependes & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Ependes

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Ependes

>>average temperature by month Ependes

>>Weather Ependes

The climatic conditions prevailing in Ependes are characterized by a warm and moderate temperature. In Ependes, precipitation is notable throughout the entirety of the year, with even its most arid month still experiencing a considerable amount of rainfall. The climate here is classified as Cfb by the Köppen-Geiger. The temperature in this location is approximately 8.7 °C | 47.7 °F, as determined by statistical analysis. In a year, the rainfall is 1530 mm | 60.2 inch.

The designated area is positioned within the northern hemisphere of our globe. The warm and pleasant days of the Summer season commence towards the conclusion of June and come to an end in September. This particular period includes a span of months, namely: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Ependes

In terms of precipitation, the month with the lowest amount of rainfall is February, recording a mere 99 mm | 3.9 inch in its entirety. This denotes an exceptionally dry period within that particular time frame. The maximum quantity of rainfall is observed during the month of July, exhibiting an average value of 166 mm | 6.5 inch.

average temperature by month Ependes

The month that experiences the highest temperatures throughout the year is referred to as July, where an average temperature of 18.0 °C | 64.4 °F prevails. During the month of January, there is a notable drop in temperature, with an average low of approximately -0.4 °C | 31.2 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Ependes

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

There exists a variation of 67 mm | 3 inch in precipitation levels between the month with the least rainfall and that which experiences maximum downpour. The degree of fluctuation in the yearly temperature is approximately 18.4 °C | 33.2 °F.

In terms of relative humidity, the month that exhibits the highest level is November with a percentage of 72.02. Conversely, July has been recorded as having the lowest amount of relative humidity at only 72.02. It is noteworthy that May has the highest number of rainy days, amounting to 17.20, whereas the month with the least rainfall is February, experiencing only 11.57 wet days.

Ependes weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Ependes

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

On average, the location of Ependes records the highest number of daily sunshine hours during July. The mean duration of sunlight per day in this month is approximately 10.23, with a total cumulative count reaching up to 317.02.

On average, Ependes records the lowest daily sunshine hours in January. During this period, there is an average of 4.93 hours of sunlight per day and a total accumulation of 152.83 hours.

Throughout the year, a total of 2698.61 hours of light are recorded in the location of Ependes. The monthly average for sunlight is approximately 88.6 hours.

Airport close to Ependes

The closest Airports of Ependes are: Bern Airport (BRN) 32.42km,EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg (BSL) 98.41km,Geneva International Airport (GVA) 98.65km

You can reach Ependes from this Cities by Plane: London (LCY), Athens (ATH), Copenhagen (CPH), Vienna (VIE), Paris (ORY), Edinburgh (EDI), Hamburg (HAM), Cologne (CGN), Oslo (OSL), Alicante (ALC), Liverpool (LPL), Málaga (AGP), Beijing (PEK), Faro (FAO), Funchal (FNC), Porto (OPO), Casablanca (CMN), Stockholm (ARN), Kyiv (KBP), Minsk (MSQ)
